summary:
“Where your talents and the world's needs cross, there lies your vocation.” [Aristotles] 

Innovatie wordt niet gedreven door het feit of het technisch mogelijk is, maar of het waarde toevoegt voor de eindgebruikers. Kunnen en willen zij het gebruiken?

Innovatie in de zorg wordt nog te vaak ontwikkeld vanuit een ander perspectief. Kan de zorg efficiënter en goedkoper?

Mijn vrouw Hester, kreeg de diagnose Alzheimer toen ze 50 was en ruim 5 jaar later stierf ze aan de gevolgen ervan. Elke dag was ik getuige van haar oneerlijke strijd voor waardigheid en zelfredzaamheid. Als mantelzorger werd ik overbelast met het organiseren en regelen van de zorg. 

De zorg in Nederland is vastgeroest in hokjes en silo’s. Het systeem is kapot. Verandering is noodzakelijk en dan mogen we niet alleen naar anderen kijken. Wat is onze eigen rol hierin? Wat is de rol van de informele zorg in de wijk?

#focusopwatwelkan

Vanuit de praktijk zie ik kansen en mogelijkheden voor innovatie in de zorg die de positieve focus leggen op wat dus wél kan en daarin verbindend zijn. Ontwikkeld met en voor de mensen in de zorg.

Wereldwijd zijn er méér dan 60 miljoen mensen met dementie. Met mijn kennis en ervaring wijd ik mij volledig aan het welzijn voor mensen met dementie en de familie (mantelzorgers).


Inspire(d) to change !

treasury_media.title: Meer geluksmomentjes voor mensen met dementie en mantelzorgers.
treasury_media.description: In het weekblad VRIENDIN vertelt Ton over zijn persoonlijke reis met Hester die op jonge leeftijd overleed aan de gevolgen van Alzheimer. En hoe hij dit heeft gebruikt om samen met Tim van Santen, TimeSteps op te richten.

treasury_media.title: #12 - Je bent jong en hoort: uw partner heeft Alzheimer
treasury_media.description: Ton geniet volop van het leven met zijn liefde: Hester. Dan komen er haperingen in het geheugen. Onderzoek wijst uit: Alzheimer. De ziekte woont vanaf dat moment in het gezin en ontwikkelt zich in een snel tempo. Hester overlijdt 5 jaar later. De weg van diagnose naar dat moment. Vallen en opstaan. Liefde en verdriet. Vechten en leunen. Focus op wat wel kan. Hoe vind je de kracht dit samen te doen? Hoe blijf je oog houden voor de mooie levenslessen die hierin misschien ook verscholen liggen?

treasury_media.title: Seizoen 5 - zorgvernieuwers - Aflevering 5 met Ton in 't Veen over zelfredzaamheid
treasury_media.description: Judith Webber is in deze podcast in gesprek met Ton in 't Veen. Zorgvernieuwer met een diepe persoonlijke drive.

treasury_media.title: Ton bouwt app voor mensen met dementie
treasury_media.description: TV Gelderland in gesprek met Ton in 't Veen.

projects.title: MovePro
projects.description:
As Product Owner I'm fully involved in this project. Together with our developers and external parties, we work in weekly sprints in order to launch in October '16 in New Orleans at the IAM Conference.

The Application

It will be the first of its kind in our industry that will assist the moving professionals from inspection at origin address through the pack-in, customs and pack out process at the destination address

Operating Systems

The application will be supported by the main operating systems for Smart Devices Android and iOS 

UIX

A redesign of the whole process with the focus on the usability and ease of use of the complete processes, resulted in an improved user experience based upon what is currently existing within the industry

White Label

The solution will be available in the look and feel of your company and will at all time adhere to the tone of voice of your preference

Multiple Language

It will standard have multiple language available, ensuring that the different professionals can operate the information in the language of their choice

MoveCloud

It will as with all the other Move4U solutions be seamlessly integrated into the MoveCloud, that enable you the necessary insights, information and benefits of such solution

Integration

At Move4U we will provide you with the necessary possibilities for integration of the solutions with legacy systems such as but not limited to RedSky and MoveWare
Reporting

With all our solutions integrated into the MoveCloud you will have the possibility to monitor live the progress of the your business, and with the dashboard you will have a good overview at a glance

projects.title: Moovyn
projects.description: This is the first platform to search, compare and book the best movers online.  It's our own branded consumer portal that provides a one-stop service by focusing on an intuitive user friendly interface for everyone who wants to move house domestically.

projects.title: Box order Widget
projects.description:
By using this widget your customers simply purchase boxes and have them delivered to their home.


New AppThe only thing you have to do is install the app on your website. Naturally we will adapt this to your requirements, tariffs and style. Potential customers who want to buy boxes just download the app from your website and fill out the form. This way you can also sell used boxes for a good price. Furthermore, it is an excellent way to find new customers by approaching these people personally to ask if they need help with their move!

The app runs on tablets, websites and in future on smartphones

projects.title: Survey Form for moving companies
projects.description:
We developed a new survey form for moving companies. Our goal was to develop an online survey tool for national as well as international moves, generating  all necessary information for a fixed quote, without losing the focus on the usability for the visitor.

We launched a Beta version in January 2012 and we are proudly to announce that the official version is live. Already 20 websites from different moving companies in Europe are working with our form and it's generating over 1000 serious quote requests per month.

contributors.headline: Azure Enthousiast - DevOps Support Engineer @ Enigmatry

projects.title: My Survey App
projects.description: The My Survey App for IOS and Android is a brief version of the Survey Form, specially designed for smartphones. In no time your clients can quickly and easily capture all the data required for a detailed moving quote. They have the possibility to send photos of the rooms  and furnishings, so it will be no longer necessary for the moving company to visit the customer for an inspection. In short, you save a lot of time and money with this app. Furthermore, you are flexible towards your potential customers: they can gather the necessary information at their convenience, 24 hours a day, seven days a week. We make sure that the App’s content and visuals match the service and style of your moving company. .

contributors.headline: Azure Enthousiast - DevOps Support Engineer @ Enigmatry

projects.title: MoveCloud
projects.description:
Mobile or smart devices backed by scalable machine intelligence in the cloud are the defining computing model of our times. The modern way of work and tools require special consideration for the challenges that our clients face not only on mobile but also within their various IT applications and or networks.
A cloud data model capable of processing data even when the device or application is offline with low-latency access to media anywhere in the world, and real-time data synchronization across all mobile platforms

projects.title: Claim App
projects.description:
When you have a flourishing business and it is high season, resources are often tight. This can cause processes like claim-handling to become extra cumbersome. Therefore, Move4U has created the ClaimApp.

The ClaimApp digitalizes the claim-report processed by your clients and gives your teams insight into all active and handled claims. Thanks to its integration with other MoveCloud solutions like the MovePro, employees can check photos from the packing and unpacking processes to validate whether or not damage can be attributed to the move.

projects.title: Move a box online tool
projects.description: We developed this widget for part load, small international moves. The online visitor is able to get an online quote within a minute and even book his move directly online. The move a box widget is easy to setup and of course in your look & feel.

projects.title: Moverall.com
projects.description:
Search – Find – Compare – Book a removal company.

I had this idea for years. A website to compare and book a mover like you are used to book a hotel.
I wrote the concept / requirements and launched the website in 2014 for Move4U.

projects.title: Launch Facebook EK Superpool 2012
projects.description: In order to launch our Facebook campaign, we developed an EK soccer pool ‘EK Superpool 2012’. One of the first soccer pools completely on Facebook. In the next year we will developing new apps for Facebook  in which we want to share information.

contributors.headline: Azure Enthousiast - DevOps Support Engineer @ Enigmatry

projects.title: www.eurohome.nl
projects.description: Developed new website in Sitecore for Eurohome. After 10 years they needed a website with more possibility’s. At this moment the site contains information only. No interaction but in the near future we try to combine the site with new features like Layers and Augmented reality.

contributors.headline: Azure Enthousiast - DevOps Support Engineer @ Enigmatry

projects.title: www.goedkoopverhuizen.nl & www.emoov.be
projects.description: Developed new website for domestic moves. The first in de market for 'Erkende Verhuizers' with a fully online servive 24/7. In Belgium this concept is re-branded and launched: www.emoov.be

projects.title: www.transpack.nl
projects.description: Developed new website for Transpack. Totally new look and feel and even more important, a new quote form. A custom made form. The visitor is able to complete his request 24/7 fully online. After launching the site, the number of requests increased and the goal for the near future is to connect it with the back-end system so online quotes can be calculated and send 24/7

contributors.headline: Azure Enthousiast - DevOps Support Engineer @ Enigmatry

projects.title: Voerman International
projects.description: Voerman International is a global partner in the moving industry. The previous website contained information about all services and company details. Our goal was to separate the general content. This resulted in 2 new websites. www.voermangroup.com and www.voerman.com

profile_positions.description: Leading Life After Me, a digital platform for end-of-life planning in North-West Europe and the UK. Committed to helping individuals preserve their legacy and providing peace of mind for their loved ones.
profile_positions.title: Ambassadeur

profile_positions.description:
Wij zijn hét strategiebureau gespecialiseerd in het begrijpen en bereiken van 50-plussers. We kijken verder dan leeftijd en geloven in de diversiteit van de grote en groeiende groep 50-plussers in Nederland en Vlaanderen. We kijken anders naar ouder worden. Daardoor zien we meer. 

Specialisaties: onderzoek, trends, strategie, advies, concepten, campagnes en marketingcommunicatie.
Wij werken onder meer voor: Woonzorg Nederland, ANBO, Oxfam Novib, Monuta en Rijksoverheid.
profile_positions.title: Expert Informele Zorg

profile_positions.description:
CareVisie faciliteert en adviseert over de detachering en werving & selectie van buitenlandse verpleegkundigen en artsen in de Nederlandse zorg.

Het gaat daarbij om medisch personeel dat de Nederlandse taal beheerst en dat voldoet aan alle kwalitatieve en administratieve eisen.

Wij willen op deze wijze ons steentje bijdragen aan het oplossen van de oplopende personeelstekorten in de Nederlandse gezondheidszorg.
profile_positions.title: Ambassadeur

profile_positions.description: Innovatie in de zorg | Social Impact | Strategie- en business advies | Project- en interim management | Investeren en/of deelnemen in tech startups in de zorg.
profile_positions.title: Oprichter

profile_positions.description:
TimeSteps is a social impact start-up. A technological innovation to extend the self-reliance of people with dementia.

TimeSteps focuses on maintaining a sense of time, structure, routine and orientation for as long as possible. We create a personal external memory for you that guides you through the day. We place relevant information for structure and routine on the home screen of the phone in the form of a "widget".

The widgets provide information with which we increase the sense of time. In addition, we investigate strategies for guiding the user through the day by mobile phone. A tool that the user recognizes as something of his own!

We also develop solutions for care givers. Solutions that simplify the management of healthcare. This is how we want to give back quality time.
profile_positions.title: Co founder

profile_positions.description:
Enigmatry - smart applications. for business. 

Inventing, designing, maintaining and enhancing smart and innovative IT applications. That's our passion.

We produce solutions that strengthen organizations and increase the effectiveness of their processes. We will:

-    make your data transparent
-    manage your applications efficiently
-    bring your ideas onto the market
profile_positions.title: Sales Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: With Enigmatry we develop smart software solutions for compagnies in their digital business transformation. I started a study ‘Digital Business Transformation’ at the HAN Arnhem one week ago. In the next 10 months, I will write a vision and strategy plan for Harmony Relocation Network.
profile_positions.title: study assignment Digital Business Transformation Harmony Relocation Network

profile_positions.description: In December ’17 I decided to end my job with Move4U to check of our bucket list. My wife is incurable sick and together we travelled around the world enjoying the big and small things in life together.
profile_positions.title: Sabbatical

profile_positions.description:
’11 – ’14 :  Move4U is a start-up I launched with Voerman International B.V. with the ambition to revolutionize the Move Industry.

I've given the specs for in- and external development teams to develop new applications for the moving industry. 'Game changing' software tools to optimize sales, to minimize the sales costs and to increase customers satisfaction. In these years I worked in scrum teams as product owner.

After 2014 I changed my roll to manager international sales. I optimized existing sales funnels, set up partnerships worldwide, gave input to development teams with new specs, maintained good relations with existing clients, developed new sales mainly in the UK and the US and gave training and coaching to the after sales team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Int. Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Move4U a startup I launched with Voerman International B.V. with the ambition to revolutionize the Move Industry.

I've given the specs for in- and external development teams to develop new software tools for the moving industry. 'Game changing' software tools to optimize sales, to minimize the sales costs and to increase customers satisfaction. 

Move4U: 
We have started off with a humble roadmap of solutions (SAAS), by at the same time piggyback on our close relations with Voerman International. We now have matured into an independent company that boost clients globally with solutions that have been created by valuing the input of our clients and partners.

All of our solutions come together in our MoveCloud backbone which connects to any ERP system, and by doing so we believe that we will revolutionize the move industry in the years to come.
profile_positions.title: Co Founder

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the setup of a digital business transformation strategy. A challenging strategy which finally resulted in the start-up of 4 new concept companies in the market:

Platform Industry concept
www.moovyn.nl  

Software as a Service concept:
www.move4u.com 

Two B2C concepts:
www.goedkoopverhuizen.nl
www.emoov.nl

Setup of a multi tenant cloud environment, mobile applications, widgets and forms. A transformation from a relocation company to a provider of digital solutions. Plus a transformation to B2C concepts and a platform provider.

The Voerman Group (www.voerman.com) exist out of 6 companies (B2B) in The Netherlands, Russia and Czech Republic. A traditional company and market leader in Europe with a yearly turnover of 70+ mln. 

In those years I’ve learned to deal with deadlines, to work with developers (scrum/agile/waterfall), to engage people in the process of changing, on all levels in the company.
profile_positions.title: Digital tranformation manager

profile_positions.description:
Budgetverhuizer (Budget move) was the first digital platform in this industry. The booking.com for removal companies. 

At that time (2005) it was a revolution in the moving industry. After a new funding Budgetverhuizer became market leader for domestic moves and handled over 200 moves per month. 

The complete customer journey was digitized and optimized. From inventory - quote - planning till booking, paying and workflow automation. All 24/7.
profile_positions.title: Founder startup digital platform

volunteer_experiences.description:
Engels

Doctor Alzheimer discovered this disease in the early 1900s. Now, more than 100 years later, there is still no solution for this disease and there are now more than 50 million people worldwide who suffer from this disease. A lot of attention and money is needed for research to be able to cure this disease.

Missie 

Ter nagedachtenis aan de mensen die te vroeg aan kanker zijn overleden, ter inspiratie van de mensen die aan het strijden zijn. 

Van onmacht naar kracht
 In de strijd tegen kanker ervaren zowel patiënten als hun dierbaren een groot gevoel van onmacht. Kanker is alomtegenwoordig. Ertegen vechten lijkt zinloos. Veertig procent van alle Belgen krijgt kanker. Iedereen maakt van dichtbij mee hoe levens drastisch beïnvloed en verwoest worden. 

 Ven2-4Cancer is opgericht met als doel de onmacht die door kanker ontstaat om te zetten in kracht. Dit doen we door met zoveel mogelijk mensen steeds weer de grenzen van het mogelijke te verleggen. Onder het motto “opgeven is geen optie” accepteren we geen beperkingen in wat we kunnen en zullen bereiken. Onze droom is dat kanker van een dodelijke naar een chronische ziekte evolueert. We willen kankerpatiënten optimaal ondersteunen om ze de mogelijkheid te geven goed, gelukkig en gezond te leven met kanker. 

Grenzen verleggen
 Ven2-4Cancer zal telkens een beroep doen op al die mensen die zich bij ons betrokken voelen om hun grenzen te verleggen. Te gaan waar nog niemand eerder is geweest: bij het werven van sponsoren, het tot 4 keer beklimmen van de Mont Ventoux, het organiseren van een evenement zonder dat het een cent kost, of het opzetten van een medisch programma dat de gezondheidszorg revolutionair gaat verbeteren. Elk resultaat dat we behalen, hoe onrealistisch het van tevoren misschien ook lijkt, motiveert ons de grenzen weer op te zoeken en de lat weer hoger te leggen. We doen dat niet voor onszelf, maar voor anderen die het zo verschrikkelijk hard nodig hebben. En zelf ervaren we het ultieme geluk dat ontstaat door het beste van jezelf te geven voor anderen. Alleen een dwaas blaast tegen de wind in, maar met zijn allen veranderen we zijn richting. 

Onze missie : Anderen faciliteren en inspireren om Goed, Gelukkig en Gezond te leven met kanker.
